item.description:
Can we all agree: With "Dynamic Island" on Apple iPhone, Android is toast. The talking heads have decided this is as big or bigger (!!) than the launch of the original iPhone.

Short Google. It's going DOWN. My Pixel 6 resale value is now likely $0.00 Sad!
item.source:markdown:
Can we all agree: With "Dynamic Island" on Apple iPhone, Android is toast. The talking heads have decided this is as big or bigger (!!) than the launch of the original iPhone.
Short Google. It's going DOWN. My Pixel 6 resale value is now likely $0.00 Sad!

item.description: With great respect to the late and GREAT Queen who has now passed. Why does it make sense for #CNBC to switch programming for however long? I wonder when they will resume business as usual. We don't need the same coverage on ALL networks.
item.source:markdown: With great respect to the late and GREAT Queen who has now passed. Why does it make sense for #CNBC to switch programming for however long? I wonder when they will resume business as usual. We don't need the same coverage on ALL networks.

item.description:
@a2brute Google Plus was a great idea. Having said that, Google (I think) dodged a bullet by shutting G+ down before the drama around Facebook. Social networks are fraught.

I do follow one @MeWe group (Phone Show Chat, with @stevelitchfield & @tedsalmonuk ) MeWe is okay, I guess.
item.source:markdown:
@a2brute Google Plus was a great idea. Having said that, Google (I think) dodged a bullet by shutting G+ down before the drama around Facebook. Social networks are fraught.
I do follow one @MeWe group (Phone Show Chat, with @stevelitchfield & @tedsalmonuk ) MeWe is okay, I guess.

item.description:
This book sounds interesting. I clicked on the ad to discover I can rent it for about 30 days for about half of the purchase price. That would motivate me to read it.

Do you ever rent ebooks? New concept to me.

#AI-viz https://t.co/1tiyKFyb4g
item.source:markdown:
This book sounds interesting. I clicked on the ad to discover I can rent it for about 30 days for about half of the purchase price. That would motivate me to read it.
Do you ever rent ebooks? New concept to me.
#AI-viz https://t.co/1tiyKFyb4g

item.description:
The reason I have not climbed Mount Kilimanjaro is the shameful lack of adequate internet. Once that's corrected, I am booking my trip.

Should I do some physical conditioning? Will absolutely need an Apple Watch Ultra. https://t.co/XyiuCbbD37
item.source:markdown:

item.description: QUOTE ... it’s not fair but rest assured, anxious America, you brought your fists to a glitter fight. This is a taco truck rally and all you have is cole slaw. You cannot deport our minds; we won’t hold funerals for our potential. We have always been what makes America great. https://t.co/MQQE8K8Hx6
item.source:markdown: QUOTE ... it’s not fair but rest assured, anxious America, you brought your fists to a glitter fight. This is a taco truck rally and all you have is cole slaw. You cannot deport our minds; we won’t hold funerals for our potential. We have always been what makes America great. https://t.co/MQQE8K8Hx6

item.description:
Data point: one Apple store sees almost 2:1 iPhone SE (current gen) sales vs. other models. Price is overwhelmingly important to walk-in buyers.

Google will sell a lot of Pixel 6a for the same reason. It is missing Qi charging but is otherwise a superior low cost GOOD phone.
item.source:markdown:
Data point: one Apple store sees almost 2:1 iPhone SE (current gen) sales vs. other models. Price is overwhelmingly important to walk-in buyers.
Google will sell a lot of Pixel 6a for the same reason. It is missing Qi charging but is otherwise a superior low cost GOOD phone.
